title: Transport Belt
description: An entity which moves multiple lanes of items across a surface.

circuit_read_hand_contents.description: Whether or not to broadcast the current number of items on this belt to a connected circuit network.

circuit_contents_read_mode.description: In what manner should the contents of this belt be broadcast to a connected circuit network.

oneOf.title: Pulse
oneOf.description: Pulse the amount of the item for 1 tick as soon as it enters the belt surface.

oneOf.title: Hold
oneOf.description: Continually broadcast the items on particular belt segment every tick.

oneOf.title: Hold (all belts)
oneOf.description: Continually broadcast the items on all connected belt segments every tick.
